.. _singularity_sif_new:

singularity sif new
-------------------

Create a new empty SIF image file

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Create a new empty SIF image file

::

  singularity sif new <containerfile>

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for new

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity sif <singularity_sif>` 	 - siftool is a program for Singularity Image Format (SIF) file manipulation
